data.name: DataPrivacyMainText
data.value:
Red Valley Software GmbH Privacy Policy for Color Valley
The protection of your personal data is important to us. This privacy policy informs you about which data is collected and processed when you use Color Valley.
1. Controller The controller responsible for data processing in connection with the use of this app is: Red Valley Software GmbH Am Pumperhölzl 12, 84323 Massing Email: rupert.eder@redvalley-software.com Website: www.redvalley-software.com
2. Collection and Processing of Personal Data
Our paid version of the app can generally be used without collecting personal data. The only exception is if you contact us via the feedback function. Feedback function: rupert.eder@redvalley-software.com If you send us feedback by email, your email address will be processed to answer your inquiry. This data is processed based on your voluntary consent in accordance with Art. 6 (1) (a) GDPR.
We also offer the option of playing with advertising for free via the Lite version of the app. Advertising in our apps is delivered by Google AdMob and its partners. Personal data such as IP addresses, device identifiers, etc. may be used to improve and finance the advertising offer. Processing may take place outside the EU/EEA. We would like to point out that data transmission over the Internet may have security gaps. Complete protection of data from access by third parties is not possible.
3. Sharing of data Your personal data will not be shared with third parties.
4. Storage and deletion of data Personal data that you send us via email will only be stored for as long as necessary to process your request. After that, it will be deleted unless there are legal retention obligations.
5. Your rights You have the right to: • Information about the data stored about you (Art. 15 GDPR) • Correction of incorrect data (Art. 16 GDPR) • Deletion of your data (Art. 17 GDPR) • Restriction of processing (Art. 18 GDPR) • Data portability (Art. 20 GDPR) • Revocation of consent granted with future effect (Art. 7 (3) GDPR) • Complaint to a supervisory authority if you believe that the processing of your data violates data protection regulations (Art. 77 GDPR).
6. Changes to the Privacy Policy This Privacy Policy may be updated from time to time. The most current version is available in the app. For questions about data protection, please contact us at: rupert.eder@redvalley-software.com This Privacy Policy complies with the requirements of the GDPR and the Apple App Store/Google Playstore guidelines for apps that process minimal data.

data.name: HelpTextExampleMultiMatch
data.value: In this example, even multiple boxes can be selected (all marked yellow boxes):

data.name: HelpTextExampleNoMatch
data.value: In the next example, there is no matching box. If an incorrect box is selected, points are deducted:

data.name: HelpTextExampleSingleMatch
data.value: In the following example, only one box can be selected (the blue one marked in yellow). This has the same color as the central inner box:

data.name: HelpTextGameGoal
data.value: The aim of the game is to select the correct outer boxes as quickly as possible by touching them with your finger.

data.name: HelpTextInitial
data.value: The central inner box always indicates the target color. This color must be searched for in the outer boxes and selected as quickly as possible to score points.

data.name: ImpressumMainText
data.value:
Legal Notice: Information according to Section 5 of the German Telemedia Act (TMG): Responsible company: Red Valley Software GmbH Headquarters: Am Pumperhölzl 12, 84323 Massing The company is registered in the commercial register and is a member of the Lower Bavaria Chamber of Industry and Commerce (IHK) (ihk@passau.ihk.de). Telephone: +49 8724 2071850 Email: Website: www.redvalley-software.com Management: Rupert Eder Registration number: HRB 11508 VAT identification number according to Section 27a of the German VAT Act (UStG): DE322142672 Programming: rupert.eder@redvalley-software.com
Data protection: You can find our data protection information under the "Data protection" button.
Copyright Notice:
Copyright 2025 by: Red Valley Software GmbH All images and content published in this application are protected by copyright.
No part of this application may be reproduced, distributed, or otherwise used in any form outside the strict limits of copyright law without the written permission of the author.
Liability:
We are responsible for the content of our app in accordance with general law, in particular Section 7 I of the German Telemedia Act (TMG).
All content was created to the best of our knowledge and belief, exercising due care.
However, no guarantee is given for its completeness and accuracy, or for any errors.
Red Valley Software GmbH is particularly not liable for economic damages resulting from the use of incomplete or incorrect data content.

data.name: LabelLaunchNotFirstTimeNewHighScore

data.value: 🙁 Too bad {0}, unfortunately you have zero points!

data.value: Please enter your player name here for the highscore list:

data.value: Would you like to start right away?

data.value: This app is ad-supported 😉, the game starts immediately after the following advertisement...
